body:
Add new package `dask-ml`.

- Described dependencies of `+docs` are based on the following files:
https://github.com/dask/dask-ml/blob/main/ci/environment-docs.yaml
- `xgboost_dependency.patch` is for modifying `xgboost`'s dependencies according to the following issues:
https://github.com/dask/dask-ml/issues/797
- When using `aarch64` environment and `gcc` compiler, a warning about `numpy` occurs. When installing `py-dask-ml` with `+docs`, the warning is treated as an error and cannot be installed. So, I added conflict.
title: py-dask-ml: add new package.
